channel.title: Projects on Tianshi's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Tianshi's Homepage

item.title: Data-driven Upper-limb Prosthesis Control and Validation
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Developed machine learning and control algorithms for human intention detection and prosthesis control with validation using VR and robotic prototypes.

item.title: Wearable Sensor Systems for Seamless Human-Machine Interaction
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Develop novel wearable sensor systems enabling accurate human intention detection (e.g., hand gesture recognition), and allowing seamless interaction.

item.title: Data-driven Modelling for Human–Robot Interaction in the Mining and Maritime Industries
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Developed human-state prediction models for VR training that supports effective human–autonomy collaboration.

item.title: Pneumatic-based Automation System
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Developed pneumatic-based mechatronic systems, including a pneumatic engine test rig and industrial assembly system using ARM Cortex-M and PLC.

item.title: Mechatronics & Robotics Engineering Teaching & Mentorship
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Tutor and mentor in Robotics subjects, teaching robot kinematics, dynamics, control systems, and hands-on design & prototyping.
